comments: Number of n X n matrices over GF(4).a(n) = k^(n^2) with k = 2, 3, 4,... counts n X n matrices over GF(k). - Vincenzo Origlio (vincenzo.origlio(AT)itc.cnr.it), Nov 14 2002
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=0,...,40
prog: (PARI) { for (n=0, 40, write("b060757.txt", n, " ", 4^(n^2)); ) } [From _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 10 2009](Maxima) A060757(n):=4^(n^2)$makelist(A060757(n),n,0,10); /* _Martin Ettl_, Nov 08 2012 */
author: Ahmed Fares (ahmedfares(AT)my-deja.com), Apr 23 2001
